overview: “David drives the vision and overall business strategy for Voyant. Previously, he was founder and managing director of the Gossamer Group, LLC, an IT consultancy serving the financial services market, where he led the creation of numerous innovative and award-winning projects for Fortune 500 enterprises. David has also held CEO positions at Political Decision Systems, an information systems company specializing in mathematical algorithms and mapping software, and Persuasive Technologies, a provider of private collaborative networks for law enforcement and trial attorneys.” (Source: Voyant)
